DOC.detailed_description: Patients recruit Sep , 2010 , Dec , 2014 . Baseline assessments start treatment include neurological examination , grade facial function , measurement ipsilateral pain , documentation concurrent medication . These patient assign receive one follow treatment group , i.e . 1 ) hormone group : oral hormone drug , accept acupuncture treatment ; 2 ) acupuncture group : use acupuncture therapy , accept oral hormone therapy ; 3 ) hormone-acupuncture combined treatment group : receive oral hormone acupuncture therapy time ; 4 ) treatment group : treatment addition 3 group treatment abroad . The secondary factor grouping ( subgroup ) : According different time treatment onset disease , acupuncture group hormone- acupuncture combine treatment group divide Type Ⅰ subgroup ( patient receive acupuncture within 10 day onset disease ) Type II subgroup ( patient receive acupuncture 10 day onset disease ) . The primary outcome time complete recovery facial function , assess Sunnybrook system House-Brackmann scale . The secondary outcome include incidence ipsilateral pain early stage palsy ( duration pain ) , proportion patient severe pain , occurrence synkinesis , facial spasm contracture , severity residual facial symptom study period .
